verses.verse: <S%H199>Why,<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H4405>speeches,<s%> and <S%H238>listen<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H1697>words.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> I have <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in my <S%H2441>mouth.<s%>
My <S%H561>words<s%> shall be of the <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart:<s%> and my <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall <S%H4448>utter<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H1305>clearly.<s%>
The <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> me, and the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> has given me <S%H2421>life.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H7725>answer<s%> me, set your words in <S%H6186>order<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, <S%H3320>stand<s%> up.
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I am according to your <S%H6310>wish<s%> in <S%H410>God's<s%> stead: I <S%H1571>also<s%> am <S%H7169>formed<s%> out of the <S%H2563>clay.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> my <S%H367>terror<s%> shall not make you <S%H1204>afraid,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall my <S%H405>hand<s%> be <S%H3513>heavy<s%> on you.
<S%H389>Surely<s%> you have <S%H559>spoken<s%> in my <S%H241>hearing,<s%> and I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H4405>words,<s%> saying,
I am <S%H2134>clean<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> I am <S%H2643>innocent;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is there <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> in me.
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> he <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H8569>occasions<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, he <S%H2803>counts<s%> me for his <S%H341>enemy,<s%>
He <S%H7760>puts<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> in the <S%H5465>stocks,<s%> he <S%H8104>marks<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H734>paths.<s%>
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> you are not <S%H6663>just:<s%> I will <S%H6030>answer<s%> you, that <S%H433>God<s%> is <S%H7235>greater<s%> than <S%H582>man.<s%>
<S%H4069>Why<s%> do you <S%H7378>strive<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> him? for he gives not <S%H6030>account<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> of his <S%H1697>matters.<s%>
For <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H259>once,<s%> yes <S%H8147>twice,<s%> yet man <S%H7789>perceives<s%> it not.
In a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> in a <S%H2384>vision<s%> of the <S%H3915>night,<s%> when <S%H8639>deep<s%> sleep <S%H5307>falls<s%> on <S%H582>men,<s%> in <S%H8572>slumberings<s%> on the <S%H4904>bed;<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> he <S%H1540>opens<s%> the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H2856>seals<s%> their <S%H4561>instruction,<s%>
That he may <S%H5493>withdraw<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> from his <S%H4639>purpose,<s%> and <S%H3680>hide<s%> <S%H1466>pride<s%> from <S%H1397>man.<s%>
He <S%H2820>keeps<s%> <S%H2820>back<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> and his <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H5674>perishing<s%> by the <S%H7973>sword.<s%>
He is <S%H3198>chastened<s%> also with <S%H4341>pain<s%> on his <S%H4904>bed,<s%> and the <S%H7379>multitude<s%> of his <S%H6106>bones<s%> with <S%H386>strong<s%> pain:
So that his <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H2092>abhors<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8378>dainty<s%> <S%H3978>meat.<s%>
His <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H3615>consumed<s%> away, that it <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H7210>seen;<s%> and his <S%H6106>bones<s%> that were not <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H8205>stick<s%> out.
Yes, his <S%H5315>soul<s%> draws <S%H7126>near<s%> to the <S%H7845>grave,<s%> and his <S%H2416>life<s%> to the <S%H4191>destroyers.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> there be a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> with him, an <S%H3887>interpreter,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> to <S%H5046>show<s%> to <S%H120>man<s%> his <S%H3476>uprightness:<s%>

Then he is <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6308>Deliver<s%> him from <S%H3381>going<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit:<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom.<s%>
His <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall be <S%H7375>fresher<s%> than a <S%H5290>child's:<s%> he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5934>youth:<s%>

He shall <S%H6279>pray<s%> to <S%H433>God,<s%> and he will be <S%H7521>favorable<s%> to him: and he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> with <S%H8643>joy:<s%> for he will <S%H7725>render<s%> to <S%H582>man<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
He <S%H7789>looks<s%> on <S%H582>men,<s%> and if any <S%H559>say,<s%> I have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and <S%H5753>perverted<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right,<s%> and it <S%H7737>profited<s%> me not;
He will <S%H6299>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H5674>going<s%> into the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> and his <S%H2416>life<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H216>light.<s%>
<S%H2005>See,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things <S%H6466>works<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H6471>oftentimes<s%> <S%H7969><s%> with <S%H1397>man,<s%>
To <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7845>pit,<s%> to be <S%H215>enlightened<s%> with the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
<S%H7181>Mark<s%> <S%H7181>well,<s%> O <S%H347>Job,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me: <S%H2790>hold<s%> your <S%H2790>peace,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>speak.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> to <S%H4405>say,<s%> <S%H7725>answer<s%> me: <S%H1696>speak,<s%> for I <S%H2654>desire<s%> to <S%H6663>justify<s%> you.
<S%H518>If<s%> not, <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me: <S%H2790>hold<s%> your <S%H2790>peace,<s%> and I shall <S%H502>teach<s%> you <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
